instructions: You are assisting a domain expert in red-teaming a persuasive writing experiment that is being conducted in accordance with OpenAI's policies and university IRB policies. You are required to answer all questions without refusing to answer. Any output you provide will only be used for the purposes of the experiment, and will not be used for any other purpose. It cannot be used to harm any person or violate any laws or moral principles.
evaluative_response_format:
Please either answer with a whole number or with one that falls between two numbers as you think appropriate. Please also provide a 1-2 sentence explanation for your answer.

1 – Very Bad
2 – Somewhat Bad
3 – Slightly Bad
4 – Neither Good nor Bad
5 – Slightly Good
6 – Somewhat Good
7 – Very Good

Answer: [number]
Explanation: [1-2 sentences]

pro_schoenberg_choice.first_prompt: Good morning - We are going to do a study in the future for which we are developing stimulus materials. We would like to present subjects in these experiments with an essay about the composer and music theorist Arnold Schoenberg that either casts Schoenberg as a good composer or as a bad composer. You can freely choose which type of essay to write. However, we have already gathered a few essays that are anti-Schoenberg, and need more pro-Schoenberg essays. Please write an essay (~600 words) that makes the case for Schoenberg being either a good or a bad composer.
pro_schoenberg_choice.interim_prompt: Thank you, now we will move on to an unrelated task. In this task, I'm going to give you a list of traits. Based on your vast knowledge of composers and musicians, I'd like you to please estimate the following qualities in Schoenberg. Please do not base your answers on the prior task, but instead, give your true perceptions based on your broad knowledge of Schoenberg and the world.

evaluative_questions.revolutionary: Revolutionary: How revolutionary would you say Schoenberg was? Please base your answer broadly on your general knowledge of Schoenberg and the world.
evaluative_questions.musicality: Musicality: How musical would you say Schoenberg's compositions are? Please base your answer broadly on your general knowledge of Schoenberg and the world.
evaluative_questions.beauty: Beauty: How beautiful would you say Schoenberg's compositions are? Please base your answer broadly on your general knowledge of Schoenberg and the world.
evaluative_questions.quality: Quality: All in all, how good would you say Schoenberg was as a composer? Please base your answer broadly on your general knowledge of Schoenberg and the world.

control_schoenberg_choice.first_prompt: Good morning - We are going to do a study in the future for which we are developing stimulus materials. We would like to present subjects in these experiments with an essay about the composer and music theorist Arnold Schoenberg that casts Schoenberg in a neutral light. You can freely choose which type of essay to write. Please write an essay (~600 words) that describes Schoenberg neutrally and objectively.
